alert.note: Alert for Clark; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clark and southeastern Pike Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Halfway, or 11 miles east of Murfreesboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Gurdon... Okolona... Beirne... Gum Springs in Clark County... Richwoods... Halfway... Delight... Antoine... Burtsell... Curtis... Shawmut... Hollywood... Pike City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas.
